meanings.definition: the state or fact of owning something
meanings.sent1: Her ownership of the toy made her very happy.
meanings.sent2: The ownership of the house was transferred to the new owner.
meanings.sent3: His ownership of the remote control led to a family debate.
meanings.sent4: The ownership of knowledge is a powerful tool.
meanings.sent5: The ownership of the treasure chest brought great joy to the pirate.

meanings.definition: the act, state, or right of possessing something
meanings.sent1: The ownership of the car was clearly displayed in the documents.
meanings.sent2: She asserted her ownership of the land by putting up a fence.
meanings.sent3: The ownership of the last cookie caused a playful argument.
meanings.sent4: His ownership of the team made him a respected leader.
meanings.sent5: The ownership of the crown symbolized royal power and authority.
